p: All data were aggregated annually at the European NUTS 3 country subdivision level (apart from central government spending data which was sourced at the country level), to produce a yearly panel data-set. The NUTS 3 classification represents small regions with a population ranging from 150,000 to 800,000 and is part of the Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics (NUTS) classification system, used to divide economic territories of the EU into three hierarchical sub categories for the purpose of data collection and statistical analysis (see [45] for further information).
